name: Zombie Runner (clicktoaddtitle)
description:
This is the final project in the Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D course by GameDev.tv

Explore a zombie-infested mansion in the dead of night. Can you find all 3 weapons?

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Right click to zoom in and out

Left Shift to run

Space to jump

F to toggle flashlight

Mouse scroll wheel or 1-4 to switch weapons.
